thread.title: Watch Adele's George Michael Tribute at The Grammy Awards
thread.title_full: Watch Adele's George Michael Tribute at The Grammy Awards

title: Watch Adele's George Michael Tribute at The Grammy Awards

organizations.name: george michael tribute share on facebook tweet
fatal attraction parody piers morgan told

text:
Adele wasn’t about to let a technical difficulty get in the way of her George Michael tribute. While singing a special cover of his song “Fastlove,” the 25 singer began off-key and stopped her performance after about a minute of singing. “I know it’s live TV… I can’t do it again like last year,” she said, referencing her technical difficulties-plagued performance of “All I Ask.” “I’m sorry for swearing, and I’m sorry for starting again. I’m sorry. I can’t mess this up for him.” Then she gave Michael a proper tribute through tears. See the performance above, and the brief flub below.
